title: London Lions Embrace Cryptocurrency: Partner with BitPay to Accept Digital Payments
description: London Lions, the British basketball club, has made a groundbreaking move into the digital currency ecosystem by partnering with BitPay, a leading cryptocurrency payment platform. This partnership will enable the club to accept digital currencies as payments for their merchandise, including popular cryptocurrencies like Dogecoin (DOGE) and XRP. By embracing these digital assets, London Lions ... Read more
